participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

fitf_s1_q1_y.Description: In your opinion, compared to other boys/girls your age, how much physical activity do you do? | 1 = Much less; 2 = A little less; 3 = About the same; 4 = A little more; 5 = Much more

fitf_s2_q1_y.Description: In your opinion, compared to other boys/girls your age, how much sedentary behaviors do you do? | 1 = Much less; 2 = A little less; 3 = About the same; 4 = A little more; 5 = Much more

fitf_s3_q1_y.Description: In your opinion, compared to other boys/girls your age, how much sleep do you get? | 1 = Much less; 2 = A little less; 3 = About the same; 4 = A little more; 5 = Much more

fitf_s4_q7_y.Description: How often did you have to remove the Fitbit? | 1 = once per day; 2 = twice per day; 3 = 3-4 times per day; 4 = more than 4 times per day

fitf_s4_q8_y___1.Description: When did you take it off (during what activities)? (Can choose more than one) (1, Shower/Bath) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitf_s4_q8_y___2.Description: When did you take it off (during what activities)? (Can choose more than one) (2, Sports) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitf_s4_q8_y___3.Description: When did you take it off (during what activities)? (Can choose more than one) (3, Swimming) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitf_s4_q8_y___4.Description: When did you take it off (during what activities)? (Can choose more than one) (4, Sleep) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitf_s4_q8_y___5.Description: When did you take it off (during what activities)? (Can choose more than one) (5, Other) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

fitf_s4_q11_y.Description: How often did you check the Fitbit to get information about your activity? | 1 = Several times per day; 2 = About once per day; 3 = Several times per week; 4 = About once per week

fitf_s4_q12_y.Description: How much did you change your physical activity while wearing the Fitbit? | 1 = A lot; 2 = Not at all; 3 = A little

fitf_s4_q14_y.Description: How much did you change your sleep while wearing the Fitbit? | 1 = A lot; 2 = Not at all; 3 = A little

fitf_s6_q3b_y.Description: Did you change your level of physical activity or amount of sleep based on the recorded activity on the app or website? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No
